allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add HTTP protocol support for Nice controller with device discovery

- Add HTTP protocol type with multi-step configuration flow
- Implement device discovery from Nice controller web interface
- Parse device list from /dev_list.htm and convert to cover entities
- Support Nice API format: /cgi/devcmd.xml?adr=1&ept=0F&cmd=XX
  - Stop: cmd=02
  - Open: cmd=03
  - Close: cmd=04
- Add BeautifulSoup4 and aiohttp dependencies
- Update config flow with device selection interface
- Support basic authentication for HTTP controller
- Maintain backward compatibility with RF433 protocol
